GET MASTERED
FOR FREE

The DIY Mastering Blog is now accepting submissions!

Woah, woah, what?


My name is Keenan, and I run Get Mastered: a free DIY mastering blog that teaches musicians and audio engineers how to master their own music.

Get Mastered is tutorial based: in every rotation of posts, I master songs submitted by musicians like you to point out techniques I use while mastering music.

What does this mean for you?

If I like your music, I will master it for you AND feature it on the blog, all at no price to you!


Free mastering and free publicity... sure doesn't sound like an opportunity to pass up.

Keep on scrolling for submission info.

Reach out!

Use the form below to reach out to me and get your song featured on Get Mastered!

Please include a link to some of your music

(I also love to hear feedback from readers! If you have any suggestions for the blog, or aspects you think could use improvement, this for is the place for that too)


Please note: Please be patient with my response to your submission or feedback! I get a lot of these

Enough!
